data.prayer: Spirit, guide someone in the church in the state of Samangan to a person ready to receive the message of the gospel, like Lydia, and who will then open her home to faith.
data.verse: One of those listening was a woman from the city of Thyatira named Lydia, a dealer in purple cloth. She was a worshiper of God. The Lord opened her heart to respond to Paul’s message.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Samangan, Afghanistan

data.prayer: Father, you said, "The earth belongs to Me and all that is in it". Please, call Samangan, Afghanistan into obedience and eternal life.
data.verse: The earth is Yahweh’s, with its fullness; the world, and those who dwell therein.

data.section_summary: On average, 31 people will die without Jesus in the next 100 hours in Samangan, Afghanistan.
data.prayer: Lord, send your gospel to these.
Father, bring yourself glory in Samangan. Through your servants plant 86 new churches that love you, love one another, and make disciples this year.
data.verse: For the earth will be filled with the knowledge of the glory of the LORD as the waters cover the sea.

data.prayer: Jesus, teach the local leaders in Samangan, Afghanistan to be humble and to serve others.
data.verse: It shall not be so among you. But whoever would be great among you must be your servant, and whoever would be first among you must be your slave, even as the Son of Man came not to be served but to serve, and to give his life as a ransom for many.

data.prayer: Father, 0.0% are known to be believers. Please, Lord call more today.
Spirit, fill the 430,500 souls living in the state of Samangan with a taste for your Word. Make it sweet as honey in their mouth.
data.verse: How sweet are your words to my taste, sweeter than honey to my mouth!

data.prayer: Father, guide the church in Samangan, Afghanistan to see their community as a holy priesthood, offering spiritual sacrifices acceptable to God.
data.verse: you also, like living stones, are being built into a spiritual house to be a holy priesthood, offering spiritual sacrifices acceptable to God through Jesus Christ.

data.prayer: Father, encourage your church in Samangan that you never forsake them.
data.verse: Those who know your name will put their trust in you, for you, Yahweh, have not forsaken those who seek you.

location.name: Samangan
location.people_groups_list: Afshari, Khatri (Sikh traditions), Arab, Tajiki, Changgar, Deaf
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Afshari (15,000), Khatri (Sikh traditions) (2,700), Arab, Tajiki (18,000), Changgar (3,100), Deaf (389,000)
